amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Sewers; rental charges; cumulative to service rate for maintenance and repair.
amendatorysection.para: The charges permitted by sections 17-925.02 to 17-925.04 shall be in addition to the charges permitted by section 17-925.01 for the maintenance and repair of a sewer system.
